PM (6/20/01 7:33:26 AM)
	The path String cannot be null since we would have got an assertion error.

JohnA (9/14/2001 3:33:58 PM)
	The NPE occurs inside String.replace, which takes two chars as arguments.  Since the arguments
	cannot be null, this must be a JDK bug?

This has never been reproduced, Path implementation has changed since it was 
reported, and the NPE occurred inside JDK code... Closing.
